title: Rush Application
description: Urgent loan submission for rapid expansion with fast approvals.

events.title: Application Submitted
events.details: Applicant pushed a rush application through the portal.

events.title: Document Package Received
events.details: Tax returns, bank statements, and business plan arrive.

events.title: Underwriting Assigned
events.details: Senior underwriter picks up the case for review.

events.title: Approval Issued
events.details: Approval granted for $325,000 with next-step funding.

narration.text: Rush application submitted, starting expedited workflow.
Approval issued with funding scheduled in 4 days.
